Generated Narrative: ValueSet smoking-status-comprehensive-code

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 365980008 (Finding of tobacco use and exposure (finding))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 722499006 (Electronic cigarette user (finding))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 699009004 (History of exposure to second hand smoke)
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 16090371000119103 (Exposure to second hand tobacco smoke (event))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 275105001 (Smoker in the family)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    16090771000119104Occupational exposure to environmental tobacco smoke (event)

name: SmokingStatusComprehensiveCode
title: SNOMED CT 吸菸狀態綜合評估值集
description: SNOMED CT + HL7 NullFlavor 性傾向值集。
